28  bool interpolate = false) const;
29 
30  // This tries to use whatever information is available to interpolate the
31  // distance and gradient -- if only one side is available, for instance,
32  // this will still estimate a 1-sided gradient. Should give the same results
33  // as getGradient() and getDistance() if all neighbors are filled.
34  bool getAdaptiveDistanceAndGradient(const Point& pos, FloatingPoint* distance,
35  Point* grad) const;
36 
37  // Without interpolation.
38  bool getNearestDistanceAndWeight(const Point& pos, FloatingPoint* distance,
39  float* weight) const;
40 
41  private:
42  bool setIndexes(const Point& pos, BlockIndex* block_index,
43  InterpIndexes* voxel_indexes) const;
44 
45  // Q vector from http://spie.org/samples/PM159.pdf
46  // Relates the interpolation distance of any arbitrary point inside a voxel
47  // to the values of the voxel corners.
48  void getQVector(const Point& voxel_pos, const Point& pos,
49  const FloatingPoint voxel_size_inv,
50  InterpVector* q_vector) const;
51 
52  bool getVoxelsAndQVector(const BlockIndex& block_index,
53  const InterpIndexes& voxel_indexes, const Point& pos,
54  const VoxelType** voxels,
55  InterpVector* q_vector) const;
56 
57  bool getVoxelsAndQVector(const Point& pos, const VoxelType** voxels,
58  InterpVector* q_vector) const;
59 
60  bool getInterpDistance(const Point& pos, FloatingPoint* distance) const;
61 
62  bool getNearestDistance(const Point& pos, FloatingPoint* distance) const;
63 
64  bool getInterpVoxel(const Point& pos, VoxelType* voxel) const;
65 
66  bool getNearestVoxel(const Point& pos, VoxelType* voxel) const;
67 
68  static float getVoxelSdf(const VoxelType& voxel);
69  static float getVoxelWeight(const VoxelType& voxel);

71  static uint8_t getRed(const VoxelType& voxel);
72  static uint8_t getBlue(const VoxelType& voxel);
73  static uint8_t getGreen(const VoxelType& voxel);
